title: Price updated! FS : Large EPDG and Sov 350 Collection Part 1
author: DougG423

posts.post_title: Price updated! FS : Large EPDG and Sov 350 Collection Part 1
posts.post_content:
Proud to offer these El Principe de Gales and Sov 350 subjects

Ambrose Puttman EPDG SGC 4.5 Only 8 higher SOLD
Bill Milligan Sov SGC 5 Only 4 higher $350
Carl Lundgren EPDG SGC 4 Only 8 higher SOLD
Carl Lundgren EPDG SGC 3 Only 11 higher SOLD
Charley Carr Sov SGC 4.5 Only 2 higher $225
Doc Casey EPDG SGC 4 Only 1 higher $300
Doc Casey Sov SGC 3 Only 10 higher $225
Gavvy Cravath EPDG SGC 4 Only 8 higher $375
Gavvy Cravath Sov SGC 4 Only 8 higher $350
Irv Young Sov SGC 4.5 None higher $700
Jake Thielman Sov SGC 4.5 Only 2 higher $375
Jerry Freeman EPDG SGC 4 Only 12 higher $325
Jerry Freeman EPDG SGC 5 Only 2 higher $475
Jimmy Lavender EPDG SGC 4.5 Only 6 higher $375
Joe Kelley EPDG SGC 4.5 Only 4 higher SOLD
John Butler Sov SGC 4 Only 4 higher SOLD
Larry Schlafly EPDG SGC 3.5 Only 9 higher $300

There's a little bit for everyone. Discount for multiple subjects. Always happy to entertain offers. They're more in this back collection. Let me know if you're looking for a certain subject. I have sold on FB T206 groups and CL. 

Price includes USPS Priority box and insurance
PPFF, PPGS and Zelle
Very nice cards. I wish there were some PSA's in there but Net 54 seems to favor SGC.

I bought a big raw lot. I decided to go with SGC to have them graded. I prefer their turnaround time, price and customer service. And the black and white makes the cards stand out. Nothing against PSA though.
Doug, they are beauties with great looking backs.  I hope they move fast for you.  You're not wrong with what you say about SGC.
I'll post more of this collection soon. It totaled 68 subjects with 36 of them SGC 4, 4.5 and 5.
Carl Lundgren EPDG SGC 3 has sold. There's still a SGC 4 and plenty more available. I'll post more from this collection soon.
Really nice Lundgren and Puttman EPDG have sold

I will happily take the Milligan Sov for $3 
:)

How didn't I catch that mistake! Note to self....don't update at lunch
